summary.span: Contém classes compatíveis com interoperação de controles da WPF e Windows Forms.

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O namespace contém classes que permitem interoperação entre o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologias.The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. Quando você usa classes, você pode hospedar [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controles em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] páginas, e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elementos no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-com base em aplicativos.When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. As duas classes chave que implementam recursos de interoperabilidade são e .The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . A classe usada depende de sua implementação de controle:Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - Use o classe quando você deve usar um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control em um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] página.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - Use o classe quando você deve usar um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento em um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-aplicativo com base em.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
